title: BRIEF-Kinross Gold Says Proceeding With Project To Incrementally Increase Throughput Capacity At Tasiast Mine To 24,000 Tonnes/Day
text:
BRIEF-Kinross Gold Says Proceeding With Project To Incrementally Increase Throughput Capacity At Tasiast Mine To 24,000 Tonnes/Day

Stock Markets 3 hours ago (Sep 15, 2019 15:40)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Kinross Gold Says Proceeding With Project To Incrementally Increase Throughput Capacity At Tasiast Mine To 24,000 Tonnes/Day Sept 15 (Reuters) - Kinross Gold Corp : * KINROSS GOLD CORP SAYS PROCEEDING WITH A PROJECT TO INCREMENTALLY INCREASE THROUGHPUT CAPACITY AT ITS TASIAST MINE TO 24,000 TONNES PER DAY * KINROSS GOLD -PROJECT EXPECTED TO RAISE PRODUCTION, CUT COSTS & GENERATE SIGNIFICANT CASH FLOW & RETURNS AT INITIAL CAPITAL COST ESTIMATE OF $150 MILLION

BRIEF-Kinross Gold Says Proceeding With Project To Incrementally Increase Throughput Capacity At Tasiast Mine To 24,000 Tonnes/Day
description: BRIEF-Kinross Gold Says Proceeding With Project To Incrementally Increase Throughput Capacity At Tasiast Mine To 24,000 Tonnes/Day
